front.title: AIPID: Application Information for the Presence Information Data Format

abstract.t: Some of the user equipment's Application Information are valuable to be shown by the Presence Service. The typical Application Information is what song the presentity is listening to. The Application Information for the Presence Information Data Format (AIPID) is an extension that adds elements to the Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) that provide additional Application Information about a presentity.
